original_text: Now he had made a bronze platform, five cubits long, five cubits wide and three cubits high, and had placed it in the center of the outer court. He stood on the platform and then knelt down before the whole assembly of Israel and spread out his hands toward heaven.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 일찍이 놋으로 대를 만들었으니 길이가 다섯 규빗이요 너비가 다섯 규빗이요 높이가 세 규빗이라 뜰 가운데에 두었더니 그가 그 위에 서서 이스라엘의 모든 회중 앞에서 무릎을 꿇고 하늘을 향하여 손을 펴고

sentences.original_text: Now he had made a bronze platform
five cubits long, five cubits wide and three cubits high
sentences.korean_translation: 길이가 다섯 규빗, 너비가 다섯 규빗, 높이가 세 규빗이라

sentences.original_text: and had placed it in the center of the outer court
and then knelt down before the whole assembly of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 온 회중 앞에 무릎을 꿇고

sentences.original_text: and spread out his hands toward heaven
